{"id":1350465723,"question_id":680,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1723245646,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"50 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1350465723/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"25.9 MB","code":"//Given a string s, return true if the s can be palindrome after deleting at most one character from it.\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        //1 <= s.length <= 105\n        //s consists of lowercase English letters.\n        int sz = s.length();\n        int i=0;\n        int j = sz-1;\n        while(i<j) {\n            if(s[i]==s[j]) {\n                i++;\n                j--;\n            } else {\n                return isPalindrome(s, i+1, j) || isPalindrome(s, i, j-1);\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n \n \n /*       if(isPalindrome(s))\n            return true;\n        int sz = s.length();\n        string new_s = \"\";\n        for(int i=0; i<sz; i++) {\n            //delete s[i];\n            new_s = s.substr(0, i) + s.substr(i+1, sz-i-1);\n            //string new_s1 = s.substr(0, i);\n            //string new_s2 = s.substr(i+1, sz-i-1);\n            //new_s = new_s1 + new_s2;\n            if(isPalindrome(new_s))\n                return true;\n        }\n        return false;*/\n\n    \n    }\n\n    bool isPalindrome(string s, int i, int j) {\n        int sz = s.length();\n        if(sz <=1)\n            return true;\n\n        //int i=0;\n        //int j = sz-1;\n        while(i<j) {\n            if( s[i] != s[j] ) {\n                return false;\n            } else {\n                i++;\n                j--;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
